Title: Patient X (1)
Plot: Mulder and Scully meet Cassandra Spender, a woman who claims to be a multiple abductee and wants to deliver a positive message about the aliens. Mulder's new found disbelief in extraterrestrial activity is enhanced while Scully forms a special bond with the woman. A series of group attacks against abductees take place and the shadowy Syndicate believes that a rebel alien resistance is attempting to destroy all their work.
GuestStars: Brian Thompson, Veronica Cartwright, Alex Shostak Jr, Ron Halder, Kurt Max Bunte, John Moore, Raoul Ganeev, Max Wyman, Barbara Dyke, Bruno Verdoni, Andrew Star, Anatol Rezmeritsa, Oleg Feoktistov, Willy Ross, Allen
